ComicInfo.Summary: The Sound of Thunder: Lady Death tracks down and kills her old nemesis, the corrupt priest Father Orbec, little knowing that he holds the key to the truce between Heaven and Hell. With Orbec dead, both angels and demons prepare for the coming Judgment War. Lucifer sends a trio of Hell's arch dukes to bring Lady Death to him but she kills them all.
